participant_1.background:

i like to go out to eat.

participant_2.background:
I've been told my steaks are to die for.
I am a very good listener and I can empathize with people well.
i blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
I don't like to talk about my family's professions.
I immerse myself in a good mystery novel to escape from life's stresses.

content.text: I like to go out to eat, but I also enjoy making homemade meals. What's your favorite meal to cook?
I love to cook steaks! I've been told they're to die for. What's your favorite kind of restaurant to go to?
I like to go to Italian restaurants. I love pasta!
That's great! I like Italian food too. I love spaghetti and meatballs.
I've been in my fair share of fights, but I'm not proud of it.
I'm not a fan of fighting. I'm more of a listener. I'm a good listener and I can empathize with people well.
That's great! I'm glad you're able to help people. I met the love of my life while working at the hospital.
That's wonderful! I'm glad you found someone special. I blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
That's interesting! I don't know much about saltwater aquariums.
It's a lot of fun! I enjoy learning about the different types of fish and plants that can live in saltwater aquariums.
That sounds like a great hobby! I like to immerse myself in a good mystery novel to escape from life's stresses.
I love reading mystery novels too! They're a great way to relax and de-stress
